Articles.Content:
After about 5 minutes of vigorous testing and design, the United Kerbal Nations Aerospace Division proudly presents:

The Pillbug Rover!

The Pillbug has everything the intrepid Kerbal explorer needs, with seating for two, autopilot, headlights, a high-powered antenna, an 0.625m docking port, surface scanning capabilities and a blistering top speed of 5.6ms! It has everything but the kitchen sink! (We tried attaching a kitchen sink. It didn't work out.)

To buy some today, all you have to do is click the link below!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hxd6fc9dyclhetv/Pillbug%20Rover.craft?dl=0

See you in the next one!
